author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION FORMS OFF OF THE SOUTHEAST U.S. COAST... ...TROPICAL STORM WATCH ISSUED FOR PORTIONS OF SOUTH CAROLINA...
summary: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION FORMS OFF OF THE SOUTHEAST U.S. COAST... ...TROPICAL STORM WATCH ISSUED FOR PORTIONS OF SOUTH CAROLINA... As of 5:00 PM EDT Fri Jul 04 the center of Three was located near 30.8, -79.0 with movement N at 2 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1012 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Depression Three (AT3/AL032025)
